General.Name: Guangdong Chaohua Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangdong Chaohua Technology Co., Ltd. primarily produces and sells printed circuit boards in China and internationally. The company offers single-sided, double-sided, multi-layer, flexible board, and aluminum substrate printed circuit boards. It also provides copper clad laminates, such as HB, 22F, CEM-1, CEM-3, FR-1, FR-4, and paper-based and composite-based copper clad laminates; electronic copper foils; prepregs, gong boards; multi-layer laminations; and CNC drilling machines. In addition, the company offers wood pulp paper and ink; investment management and investment consulting; supply chain management; hotel management; intellectual property services; and technology intermediary services. Further, it is involved in the import and export trade of electronic and electrical products; and research and development of numerical control technology. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Meizhou, China.
